backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining data types (SurgeryCase, Task, Species, Sex) and CRUD operations for veterinary surgery cases, user profiles, and OpenAI config, with role-based access control via MixinAuthorization and state migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that upgrades actor state by adding the new `followUpSelected` and `followUpCompleted` fields to existing SurgeryCase Task records, defaulting both to false.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the 'Follow Up' checklist item addition (with aqua color token) in checklist.ts to test ID REQ-2 with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the SurgiPaw PWA, referencing the app manifest, favicon, and the React app's main.tsx module entry.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for SurgiPaw defining app name, display mode, theme colors, and icon assets at multiple resolutions.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache-first strategy with precaching of app shell assets, runtime caching of static files, and exclusions for auth and API calls.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication state, navigation between Dashboard and Cases views, profile setup modal display, and the sticky app header with login controls.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/I: SVG workflow icon component for the Culture task type, rendering three small circles inside a larger circle using the culture workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Discharge Notes task type, rendering a document with a checkmark using the discharge workflow color token.
SVG workflow icon component for the Follow Up task type, rendering a circular arrow using the followup workflow color token.
Renders a histology workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with purple color and SVG paths representing a microscope/circle motif.
Renders an imaging workflow icon as a grayscale PNG image of an X-ray bone icon at 24x24 pixels.
Renders a labs workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with orange color and SVG paths representing a test tube.
Renders a notification workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with yellow color and an SVG speech bubble path.
Renders a surgery report workflow icon using WorkflowIconBase with red color and SVG paths depicting a surgical instrument on a document.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/W: Maps task type strings to their corresponding icon components and renders the appropriate icon based on a given type prop.
Base SVG wrapper component for workflow icons that applies consistent sizing, stroke color, and stroke styling to child SVG elements.
frontend/src/components/workflow-icons/w: Exports shared design tokens for workflow icons including a color map per workflow type, icon size, and stroke width.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Empty file intended to define an authentication context.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Au: Empty file intended to define an authentication view component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Lo: Login/logout button component that uses Internet Identity authentication, toggling between login and logout actions and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
Empty file intended to define a login form component.
Empty file intended to define a logout button component.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Pr: Modal dialog that prompts a newly authenticated user to enter their name and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/features/auth/components/Re: Empty file intended to define a registration form component.
frontend/src/features/auth/validation.ts: Empty file intended to hold authentication-related validation logic.
frontend/src/features/cases/checklist.ts: Defines the CHECKLIST_ITEMS array describing all workflow task types with their metadata, and exports helper functions to get default selections, remaining incomplete tasks, and task colors.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/C: Empty file intended to define a camera capture modal component.
Expandable card component displaying a surgery case's patient info, remaining workflow checklist items, and actions for editing, toggling task completion, and deleting the case.
Dialog for editing an existing surgery case's fields and task checklist selections, converting dates between display strings and nanosecond timestamps before saving via a mutation hook.
Dialog for creating a new surgery case with form fields, checklist task selections, speech-to-text quick fill, and debounced previous-case lookup, submitting via a create case mutation.

Main list view component for surgery cases that handles fetching, filtering (species, tasks, search), sorting, and rendering case cards, along with controls for creating new cases and CSV import/export.
A search input component with a clear button that allows users to search cases by any field.
A dropdown select component for choosing the sort order of the cases list, using predefined sort options.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by species (canine, feline, other), with selection state persisted to sessionStorage.
A popover filter component for filtering cases by task types and completion status, with filter state persisted to sessionStorage.
Renders a checklist of selected tasks for a surgery case, allowing toggling of task completion with visual strikethrough feedback.
Panel component that handles CSV export of all cases and CSV import with parsing, validation, progress tracking, and sequential backend create/update mutations.
frontend/src/features/cases/components/D: A date input component supporting manual MM/DD/YYYY entry with auto-slash insertion and a calendar popover picker, with blur validation and auto-advance on completion.
Provides functions to export surgery cases to a CSV file and import cases from a CSV file, including row parsing, field validation, and error collection.
frontend/src/features/cases/csv/caseCsvS: Defines the 17-column CSV schema for veterinary surgery case import/export, including column headers, TypeScript types, and validation constants for species, sex, and boolean values.
frontend/src/features/cases/filtering.ts: Exports utility functions to filter surgery cases by species, task types, incomplete tasks, or fully completed tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/hooks/useSpe: A React hook that wraps the browser's SpeechRecognition API to provide recording state, transcript accumulation, error handling, and start/stop controls.
frontend/src/features/cases/parsing/pars: Preprocesses raw OCR text by normalizing whitespace, correcting common character recognition errors, and removing artifacts; used as a fallback text cleaner.
Parses label:value formatted text lines into a partial CaseFormData object by mapping recognized field labels to their corresponding typed values.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/generate: Generates and triggers a browser print dialog for a styled HTML report of surgery cases that have at least one incomplete task, rendered inside a hidden iframe.
Generates and triggers a CSV download of all surgery cases, including patient details and remaining checklist tasks, with proper CSV escaping.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/pdfForma: Utility functions for formatting dates, species, sex enums, and task lists into human-readable strings for PDF display.
frontend/src/features/cases/pdf/reportFo: Utility functions for formatting dates, species, and sex enums into human-readable strings for CSV report output.
frontend/src/features/cases/search.ts: Filters a list of surgery cases by a search query, matching against patient fields and incomplete checklist item labels.
frontend/src/features/cases/sorting.ts: Defines sort options and a function to sort surgery cases by arrival date or number of remaining open tasks.
frontend/src/features/cases/types.ts: Defines constant option arrays for species and sex dropdowns, and the CaseFormData interface for the case creation/edit form.
frontend/src/features/cases/validation.t: Provides validation functions for case form fields and utility functions for converting between Date objects, nanosecond timestamps, and formatted date strings, plus species/sex parsing.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Main dashboard React component that displays surgery cases with filtering, sorting, searching, and stats, and supports creating new cases.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/utils/op: Utility functions to extract open task items from a surgery case and calculate the total count of open tasks across all cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: React hook that returns a debounced version of a given value, updating only after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend actor interactions including user profiles, surgery cases, tasks, dashboard data, and OpenAI config using TanStack Query's useQuery and useMutation.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light-mode design system, including semantic color tokens for UI elements like complaints, notes, and species fields.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single `cn` utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/jspdf-autotable.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf-autotable module.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty TypeScript declaration file for the jspdf module.
frontend/src/types/tesseract.d.ts: TypeScript ambient module declaration for tesseract.js, defining interfaces for OCR workers, recognition results, and enums for page segmentation and OCR engine modes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that maps OKLCH CSS variables to semantic color tokens, extends the theme with Inter font and custom border radii, and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for SurgiPaw describing current features, pending feature requests (including adding a 'Follow Up' task with aqua icon), and architectural notes about ICP canister storage.
